name: Byrdhouse Easy Ginger Beef Sandwiches
author: SunnyByrd
summary: Gingery beef on a chewy hoagie roll, yum.  My oldest son and I love these and could easily wolf the whole batch down - little brother and dad have to fight us for 'em!
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds boneless beef sirloin steak, cut into thin strips
3 large celery rib, thinly sliced crosswise
2 tablespoons soy sauce, or to taste
1 teaspoon chili oil, or to taste
directions: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Stir in the sirloin strips, and cook a few minutes until the strips begin to brown, but are still a little pink
Stir in the onion and garlic; cook for 2 minutes
Add the celery and ginger, continue cooking until the onion has softened, about 3 minutes
Season with soy sauce and chili oil
Divide among hoagie rolls and serve
